title: Relationship-poltics to religion with Wars of Rel.

content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. Discuss the relationship between politics and religion by examining the wars of religion. Choose TWO specific examples from the following: Dutch Revolt French Wars of Religion English Civil War Thirty Years' War Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
